document_data.caption: A map showing Gemstone Street in northwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Gemstone Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Gemstone Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Gemstone Street was found within northwest Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. It branched from [[Warrior Street]] in the north and terminated a short distance away in the south at the barrier separating the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] from the Common Quarter.
document_data.Description: It was one of Zhentil Keep's smaller streets at roughly {{SI|300|ft|long=yes}} in length.
